Koga Shuko/Unitron/Anubis/Hades/Serpentor:





Koga Shuko, Unitron, Anubis, Hades, and Serpentor walked onto the bridge of 
the Newcoemr's ship.  

Unitron sat a scanner.  "I'm detecting an unknown com."

"What?  So...someone is blocking us only.  They will all die.  Let me hear 
it."

Unitron played Defection's message.   

Koga Shuko nodded his head.  "I see...I wish Set were here.  He's more 
experienced at negotiations with killers than I am."  Activating his com, he 
spoke to Defenction, on Defenction's com frequency.  

<I, am Koga Shuko.  Errr...Defection, please understand my hesitation to 
welcome you in my base with open arms.  But, as I'm sure you know, we are in 
a war.  Especially some possible deserter of another side who may just be a 
spy.  So, I can't trust you.  At least not yet.  A test is in order.  I hope 
you are not offended, but I can't let every wayward robot enter my cadre.  It 
would be pure stupid of me.  There is something blocking our com frequencies, 
or at least one at a time for now.  We can change our frequencies of course, 
but if done at the right time...the consequences of no communication could be 
costly.  So...I need you two to find out what the source of the thing that is 
jamming my frequencies are.  Report back to me with its location and what it 
is exactly.  A tower, an alien device, whatever.  If it is Predacon, Maximal, 
or some other Cybertronian faction, if you can destroy it, do so.  But if 
it's to heavily guarded for two robots, then just report back to me>

Koga Shuko whispered into Anubis' audio receptor, in turn Anubis whispered to 
Unitron.  Unitron nodded.

Unitron waited, being ordered to go down to the mercenaries they had hired 
earlier, to give them their fee and offer them another job.  The solar panels 
earlier had made plenty of energon.
